Package com.bankapp.models

Class CurrentAccount

java.lang.Object
com.bankapp.models.Account
com.bankapp.models.CurrentAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Account>
public class CurrentAccount extends Account implements Serializable
Represents a current account within the bank application.

  • Constructor Details

    • CurrentAccount

      public CurrentAccount(Client client, double balance, int RIB, Date openingDate, Date closingDate, boolean isDisabled, PaymentCollection payments, TransactionCollection transactions, LoanCollection loans, double overdraftLimit, SavingAccountCollection linkedSavingsAccounts)
      Constructs a new CurrentAccount with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      client - the client who owns the account
      balance - the initial balance of the account
      RIB - the unique identifier for the account
      openingDate - the date the account was opened
      closingDate - the date the account will be closed
      isDisabled - whether the account is disabled
      payments - the collection of payments associated with the account
      transactions - the collection of transactions associated with the account
      loans - the collection of loans associated with the account
      overdraftLimit - the overdraft limit for the account
      linkedSavingsAccounts - the collection of savings accounts linked to this current account
